IonicSecurity::SDK::RsaKeyPersistor Class Reference

Wrapper class around the C++ RSA key persistor class. Implements RSA key storage. More...

Detailed Description

Wrapper class around the C++ RSA key persistor class. Implements RSA key storage.

Member Function Documentation

◆ LoadPrivateKeyBer()

RsaPrivateKey IonicSecurity::SDK::RsaKeyPersistor::LoadPrivateKeyBer ( array< System::Byte >^  mpbyBuffer)

Loads an RSA private key from a memory buffer.

Parameters
[in]mpbyBufferThe input buffer to be loaded.

This function loads an RSA private key from a memory buffer using ASN.1 BER.

If any error occurs, such as failure to allocate memory, internal exceptions, etc. an SdkException is thrown.

Returns
Returns a private key output object
See also
RsaKeyPersistor::SavePrivateKeyDer(RsaPrivateKey^ privateKey)

◆ LoadPublicKeyBer()

RsaPublicKey IonicSecurity::SDK::RsaKeyPersistor::LoadPublicKeyBer ( array< System::Byte >^  mpbyBuffer)

Loads an RSA public key from a memory buffer.

Parameters
[in]mpbyBufferThe input buffer to be loaded.

This function loads an RSA public key from a memory buffer using ASN.1 BER.

If any error occurs, such as failure to allocate memory, internal exceptions, etc. an SdkException is thrown.

Returns
Returns a public key output object.
See also
RsaKeyPersistor::SavePrivateKeyDer(RsaPrivateKey^ privateKey)

◆ SavePrivateKeyDer()

array< System::Byte > IonicSecurity::SDK::RsaKeyPersistor::SavePrivateKeyDer ( RsaPrivateKey^  privateKey)

Saves an RSA private key into a memory buffer.

Parameters
[in]privateKeyThe private key to be saved.

This function saves an RSA private key into a memory buffer using ASN.1 DER.

If any error occurs, such as failure to allocate memory, internal exceptions, etc. an SdkException is thrown.

Returns
Returns an output buffer that will hold the resulting key.
See also
RsaKeyPersistor::LoadPrivateKeyBer(array<System::Byte>^ mpbyBuffer)

◆ SavePublicKeyDer()

array< System::Byte > IonicSecurity::SDK::RsaKeyPersistor::SavePublicKeyDer ( RsaPublicKey^  publicKey)

Saves an RSA public key into a memory buffer.

Parameters
[in]publicKeyThe public key to be saved.

This function saves an RSA public key into a memory buffer using ASN.1 DER.

If any error occurs, such as failure to allocate memory, internal exceptions, etc. an SdkException is thrown.

Returns
Returns an output buffer that will hold the resulting key.
See also
RsaKeyPersistor::LoadPublicKeyBer(array<System::Byte>^ mpbyBuffer)
